channel.title: Boxing
channel.description:
In boxingScape there is a boxing arena, where u fight other people, and if u die u wont lose anything. I want to add that but i don't know how... This is a pic of a boxing arena which is like i want http://i46.tinypic.com/23l1sp0.png Also if this isnt much trouble, i want it to be like, when u try to go in the boxing arena, it wont allow u unless u have a boxing glove on, and u can't have any armour on. Thanks.
___________________________________________________________________________________________________ Ps. Still needing a command which kills everyone on the server ;D ::nuke
